articles.headline: Golden State plays Cleveland, aims to end road skid
articles.description: Golden State Warriors (11-12, eighth in the Western Conference) vs. Cleveland Cavaliers (14-10, eighth in the Eastern Conference)

articles.headline: Philadelphia plays Los Angeles, aims for 4th straight victory
articles.description: Los Angeles Lakers (16-6, third in the Western Conference) vs. Philadelphia 76ers (13-9, seventh in the Eastern Conference)

articles.headline: What are the longest winning streaks in NBA history?
articles.description: The 1971-1972 Los Angeles Lakers have the longest winning streak in NBA history. See which other teams make the list.

images.name: Jerry West [608x342]
images.caption: Jerry West and the 1971-1972 Los Angeles Lakers have the longest winning streak in NBA history.

articles.headline: What is the best start to a season in NBA history?
articles.description: The Golden State Warriors achieved the best start to a season in NBA history. Which other teams make the list? Check out more hot streaks now.

images.name: Stephen Curry 160530 [608x342] - Copy
images.caption: The 2025-16 Golden State Warriors hold the record for the best start to a season in NBA history.

articles.headline: Thunder win 14th straight behind Gilgeous-Alexander's 33 points
articles.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 33 points, stretching his 20-point streak to 95 straight games, and the Thunder stomped the Mavericks 132-111 for their 14th straight win.

images.name: Dallas Mavericks vs. Oklahoma City Thunder: Game Highlights
images.caption: Dallas Mavericks vs. Oklahoma City Thunder: Game Highlights

articles.headline: Gilgeous-Alexander's 33 points in 3 quarters power Thunder to 14th straight win
articles.description: — Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 33 in three quarters, and the Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Dallas Mavericks 132-111 on Friday night to claim their 14th straight win.

images.name: Jalen Williams throws down the hammer
images.caption: Jalen Williams throws down the hammer
